ygData.subject: Re: Well, the patch is in...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not that I want to get involved in a flame war here or anything..although they /are/ fun when you participate, and don t just have to read the garbage
ygData.messageBody:
>>If you don' want your mailbox "clogged" then I would suggest leaving this
>>and any other mailing list

Not that I want to get involved in a flame war here or anything..although
they /are/ fun when you participate, and don't just have to read the garbage
pouring through..

Why...why post a complete list of all the patch changes in a ...
BLACKSMITHING... group, when it can be had by doing something you do every
day...STARTING THE GAME!

Enough said

Dameat
10th Level Cleric
Rodcet Nife
